org.spongepowered.api.text.format

Interface TextStyle

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    TextStyle.Base

    public interface TextStyle
    A TextStyle represents the style that a Message has. It is an immutable class. There are several Base styles specified in TextStyles which are the Minecraft base types. From these types, the and(TextStyle...), andNot(TextStyle...), and negate() methods can compose text styles together.

    Interestingly enough, TextStyle actually forms a monoid with the and(TextStyle...) operation as the monoid operation and the TextStyle elements as the elements of the monoid. I do not want to prove closure or the other monoid laws, but yay math!

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  TextStyle.Base
      A Base text style is a text style that is represented in Minecraft.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TextStyle and(TextStyle... styles)
      Composes this TextStyle with the passed in TextStyles.
      TextStyle andNot(TextStyle... styles)
      Composes this TextStyle with the passed in TextStyles, but negates them before composition.
      boolean is(TextStyle style)
      Checks for if the given TextStyle is contained in this TextStyle.
      boolean isComposite()
      Returns whether this text style is a composite of multiple base text styles.
      TextStyle negate()
      Negates this text style.

    • Method Detail

      • isComposite

        boolean isComposite()
        Returns whether this text style is a composite of multiple base text styles.
        Returns:
        A boolean for whether this text style is a composite

      • is

        boolean is(TextStyle style)
        Checks for if the given TextStyle is contained in this TextStyle. It is equivalent if checking that applying this TextStyle includes applying the passed in TextStyle.
        Parameters:
        style - The TextStyle to check for existence
        Returns:
        A boolean representing if the given TextStyle is in this TextStyle

      • negate

        TextStyle negate()
        Negates this text style. This is useful for undoing text styles that are inherited from parent Messages.
        Returns:
        A new TextStyle that is the inverse of this TextStyle.

      • and

        TextStyle and(TextStyle... styles)
        Composes this TextStyle with the passed in TextStyles.
        Parameters:
        styles - A list of TextStyles to compose this one with
        Returns:
        A new TextStyle composed out of passed in text styles

      • andNot

        TextStyle andNot(TextStyle... styles)
        Composes this TextStyle with the passed in TextStyles, but negates them before composition. This is the same as negating all the passed in TextStyles and then using the and(TextStyle...) method.
        Parameters:
        styles - A list of TextStyles to compose this one with
        Returns:
        A new TextStyle composed out of passed in text styles
